name: Grupo de Estudos de Cancro de Cabeça e Pescoço
goal: The Portuguese Head and Neck Cancer Study Group (GECCP) role is to develop the scientific activities; elaboration of consensuses of therapeutic orientation; organization of activities for the general population that have been aware to the problem of head and neck cancer in Portugal; bringing it to the agenda with the European awareness week for head and neck cancer; and finally the challenge of clinical research, which has now been completed with the first initiative trial of the researcher whose funding at the European level has recently been approved.
euInitiatives: Activities within health politics adressing some public health issues related with head and neck cancer.
